course_title: Special Topics in Language and Culture: Gothic Fiction
course_description: Study of Hispanic authors, genres, literary periods, cinema, or cultural trends not represented in the regular curriculum. The structure of the particular course is determined by the nature of the topic and the preference of the instructor.
